SEARCH
Package ca.eshopexpress.service.impl

Class GameServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ca.eshopexpress.service.impl.GameServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameService
@Service public class GameServiceImpl extends Object implements GameService
Service implementation for managing game-related operations such as retrieving, filtering, saving, deleting, and updating games.
Since:
2025-05-12
